column4: hi all, iam wondering if its possible that a LG L1950T is slightly incompatible with linux? or possible my nvidia 7600gt.  Ubuntu resoultion gui says its running at 50mhz, but the monitors menus states 60mhz.  Also the feisty live cd boots up with the moniter out of sync
mine does that too, nvidia-settings says 60 too, so I just assume the screen resolution program is wrong

ok cool, checked nvidia display settings aswell, says 60 too.  do you think the live cd booting up with monitor out of sync is anything to worry about, i guess i could always grab the alternate install cd.  the fedore 7 live cd also dosent work, the monitor is in sync, but the screen is garbeled
nothing wrong with using the alternate cd, I prefer it
